align.description: This value will be merged into the configuration of the placement, set with reference to [dom-align](https://github.com/yiminghe/dom-align)
align.description_zh: 该值将合并到 placement 的配置中，设置参考 [dom-align](https://github.com/yiminghe/dom-align)

arrowPointAtCenter.description: Whether the arrow points to the center of the target element
arrowPointAtCenter.description_zh: 箭头是否指向目标元素中心

autoAdjustOverflow.description: Automatically adjusts the position of bubbles when they are occluded
autoAdjustOverflow.description_zh: 气泡被遮挡时自动调整位置

destroyTooltipOnHide.description: Whether to destroy the tooltip after it is hidden

:getPopupContainer.description: The overlay renders the parent node, which is rendered to the body by default
:getPopupContainer.description_zh: 浮层渲染父节点，默认渲染到 body 上

:mouseEnterDelay.description: How much delay does it take for the mouse to be moved in before the Tooltip is displayed, in seconds
:mouseEnterDelay.description_zh: 鼠标移入后延时多少才显示 Tooltip，单位：秒

:mouseLeaveDelay.description: How much delay does it take to hide the tooltip after the mouse is removed, in seconds
:mouseLeaveDelay.description_zh: 鼠标移出后延时多少才隐藏 Tooltip，单位：秒

overlayClassName.description: The name of the card class

placement.description: The bubble box position can be selected as 'top' 'left' 'right' 'bottom' 'topLeft' 'topRight' 'bottomLeft' 'bottomRight' 'leftTop' 'leftBottom' 'rightTop' rightBottom'

v-model:open.description: Used to manually control the visibility and concealment of the floating layer, less than 4.0.0 use visible
v-model:open.description_zh: 用于手动控制浮层显隐, 小于 4.0.0 使用 visible
